message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
